attributes.action: Allow all males that don't take paternity leave to have 2 weeks X box leave 2.4 times during their career.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those that lack the ability or need to father children do not get paternity allowance. This is discriminatory, we petition the government to allow all males to 'opt out' of paternity leave and have some X box leave instead (or PS3). if in the case that someone uses their X box leave, they orgo all rights to any possible future paternity leave.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
